create_signup.phoneExists: An account with the phone number you entered already exists. Try sign in instead.
create_signup.emailExists: An account with the email you entered already exists. Try sign in instead.
create_signup.reissueDenied: A verification code has been issued just before. Please check the receiving again, then please try again more than 5 minutes later.

verify_code.codeUnavailable: This verification code is no longer available as it's already expired. Please reissue a new code.
verify_code.maxRetryExceeded: The last code we sent is no longer available due to a series of incorrect codes. Please reissue a new code.
verify_code.invalidCode: The code you entered is invalid. Please try again.

verify.badLink: This verification link is not available. It might have expired.

continue_session.expired: We could not continue your session due to security reasons. Please sign into your account.

errors.invalidToken: The token presented is invalid. Please try again from the beginning.
errors.alreadySignedIn: You are already signed in to this account.

create.notFound: We searched every corner of the database but couldn't find an account.

verify.pleaseReissue: The email we sent lastly is no longer available. Please send it again.
verify.maxAttemptsError: The last code we sent is no longer available due to a series of incorrect codes. Please reissue a new code.
verify.invalidCodeError: The code you entered is invalid.
verify.expiredCodeError: This verification code is no longer available as it's already expired. Please reissue a new code.

locales.badQuery: Some of the queries you sent was wrong.

displayName.lastOneError: Only the last one cannot be deleted.

profilePicture.limitExceeded: You have exceeded the maximum number of profile pictures that can be saved in your library. Delete some items and try again
